content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

The main target image shows two distinct structures made of building blocks:

## Structure 1 (Left): Vehicle/Train
- Consists of approximately 8 blocks arranged in 3 layers
- Has yellow cylindrical roof, blue and red cubic body, yellow rectangular base, and orange cylindrical wheels

## Structure 2 (Right): Bridge/House
- Consists of approximately 8 blocks arranged in 3-4 layers
- Has orange triangular roof, blue cubic body, green rectangular connector, red arch base, and orange cylindrical pillars

# Required Blocks from the Dictionary

For Structure 1 (Vehicle/Train):
- Yellow cylinders (horizontal) for roof - Block 13
- Blue cube for body - Block 4
- Red cube for body - Block 5
- Yellow rectangular blocks (horizontal) for base - Block 8 
- Green rectangular block (horizontal) for top - Block 6
- Orange cylindrical wheels (horizontal) - Block 12 (two of these)

For Structure 2 (Bridge/House):
- Orange triangular roof - Block 16
- Blue cubes for main body - Block 4 (two of these)
- Green rectangular block (horizontal) - Block 6
- Red arch block - Block 1
- Orange cylindrical pillars (vertical) - Block 10 (two of these)

# Assembly Order

For Structure 1 (Vehicle/Train):
```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 12
    Step2: Move block with index 12
    Step3: Move block with index 8
    Step4: Move block with index 8
    Step5: Move block with index 4
    Step6: Move block with index 5
    Step7: Move block with index 6
    Step8: Move block with index 13
}
```

For Structure 2 (Bridge/House):
```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1
    Step2: Move block with index 10
    Step3: Move block with index 10
    Step4: Move block with index 6
    Step5: Move block with index 4
    Step6: Move block with index 4
    Step7: Move block with index 16
}
```
